Sasuke appears in front of his opponent and unsheaths his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|sword]]. He then slashes many times and reappears behind his opponent. The opponent collapses after he sheathes his sword back in the hilt.

[[es:Instantáneo]]
[[pl:Setsuna (technika)]]
